name: Magneton

attacks.name: Thunder Wave
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Selfdestruct
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to each Pokémon on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Magneton does 80 damage to itself.

flavorText: Formed by several Magnemites linked together. It frequently appears when sunspots flare up.

strengths: Lightning type good against Water Pokemon
weaknesses: 60 HP is very low for a Stage 1
synergies: Mr. Mime - Immune to Selfdestruct bench damage
Pokemon Center - Heal bench after Selfdestruct

competitiveHistory: Magneton saw some play as a last-resort option. Selfdestruct could take out key threats but at the cost of Magneton itself and potential bench damage. The 60 HP made it fragile, limiting its competitive viability compared to other attackers.

rulings.ruling: Selfdestruct damages ALL Benched Pokemon on both sides, including your own.
Weakness and Resistance are not applied to bench damage from Selfdestruct.
Magneton's 80 self-damage will Knock Out Magneton since it only has 60 HP.
If Magneton Knocks Out the Defending Pokemon with Selfdestruct, both players take a prize simultaneously.
